titles.title: To amend the Agricultural Act of 2014 to make available additional funds for the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands pilot project.
Northern Mariana Islands Enhanced Nutrition Assistance Act of 2017
Northern Mariana Islands Enhanced Nutrition Assistance Act of 2017
Northern Mariana Islands Enhanced Nutrition Assistance Act of 2017

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Nutrition.

bill.summary:
Northern Mariana Islands Enhanced Nutrition Assistance Act of 2017
This bill amends the Agricultural Act of 2014 to reauthorize through FY2023 the pilot program for the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands to operate the Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (SNAP, formerly known as the food stamp program) in the same manner in which the program is operated in the states.
